Definition.WordDefinition: Ticonderoga, NY (village, FIPS 73880) Location: 43.84701 N, 73.42565 W Population (1990): 2770 (1156 housing units) Area: 3.5 sq km (land), 0.1 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 12883
Ticonderoga n : American revolutionary troops captured Fort Ticonderoga from the British in May 1775 [syn: {Fort Ticonderoga}]
